posts.postText:
I download everything perfectly fine through the fastDL, but then for some reason ingame every player is an ERROR and I can't hear custom sounds.

Ideas for a fix/post content pack?

Sorry, not really sure. It's client-side, since all the models and sounds download perfectly fine for everyone else.
Did you recently reinstall GMod? I had the same thing happen, but for custom sounds when I cleaned out my gmod.

Extract this to your Garrysmod/garrysmod folder...
It includes all sound/nnjg/*, sound/siege/* and the custom models used by maps that don't force a model change.

http://www.mediafire.com/?q6pg6yv8odrj6l6
Thanks! I'll mount it as an addon :)
